text:
#KnowTheFacts

#Chloroquine/#Hydroxychroloquine is an antimalarial drug and currently not approved for treatment/self-treatment and prevention of #COVID19.

Do Not take it at home for prevention of CoVID-19 because of heart related & other side effects. 

📞Always #AskAPharmacist https://t.co/aYrqbyyRov
